title: Shirt factory
creator_credit: Hazel Swift and British Film Institute
brief_description: A reaction, expressed in dance and mime, to a school visit to the local shirt factory; a protest at the monotony of piece work. Adapted from an original stage production for an end of term concert at Markfield Secondary School, North London.
